Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers continue to be disrespected as the holder of the best record in the league.
This team beat this GS team 136 to 117 in their last meeting.
GS has been cold of late, dropping 7 of their last 10 games (shooting 42.7%), while CLE continues to roll, winning 9 of their last 10 (shooting 49.7%).
This Cavs team can score in a multitude of ways - on the midrange and outside with Mitchell and Garland, and provide a great offensive and defensive presence on the inside with Mobley and Allen.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cavaliers are built on scoring the 2nd most points per game (122.7) and allowing the 12th fewest points per game.
Warriors are built on defense, allowing the 10th fewest points per game, but are only scoring the 16th most points per game.
Others: The game is scheduled for 3:00 am on December 31, 2024, at Chase Center in San Francisco.

Warriors Injuries: Andrew Wiggins (personal) out, Draymond Green (back) out, Stephen Curry (injury management) out, Gary Payton (calf) out, Jonathan Kuminga (ankle) out, Brandin Podziemski (abdominal) out.
Cavaliers Injuries: Ty Jerome (illness) doubtful, Emoni Bates (knee) out.
